korean: 특별히 살 건 없지만 그냥 구경하러 나왔다.
이것저것 보면서 눈으로 쇼핑하는 재미가 쏠쏠했어.
가끔은 이렇게 보기만 하는 것도 나쁘지 않네.
english: I didn't have anything specific to buy, but I went out just to browse.
It was fun to window shop and look at various things.
My wallet stayed thin, but I definitely got a change of mood.
Sometimes just looking like this isn't bad at all.
